DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Central Institutional Review Board Disapproval Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the Central Institutional Review Board (CIRB) disapproved the document.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Central Institutional Review Board Refusal
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to a writing that contains information about a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people and the disapproval by the Central Institutional Review Board (CIRB).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :A writing that contains information.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredDefinition:
Initiative sponsored by NCI in consultation with the Department of Health and Human Services Office
for Human Research Protections (OHRP) designed to help reduce the administrative burden on local IRBs and investigators
while continuing a high level of protection for human research participants. A local IRB's use of the CIRB facilitated
review mechanism enables an investigator to enroll patients into adult and pediatric Cooperative Group clinical trials
significantly faster than when employing traditional method of IRB review.:To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

Concepts.definition: Initiative sponsored by NCI in consultation with the Department of Health and Human Services Office for Human Research Protections (OHRP) designed to help reduce the administrative burden on local IRBs and investigators while continuing a high level of protection for human research participants. A local IRB's use of the CIRB facilitated review mechanism enables an investigator to enroll patients into adult and pediatric Cooperative Group clinical trials significantly faster than when employing traditional method of IRB review.
To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
